title: Dangerous Seduction
description: Book 6 in Forbidden Secrets series.Marcie tossed away her job at a prestigious company for Mano, a man she barely knows. A man she loves beyond reason, whose touch ignites her soul and burns her body down. Mano is full of mysterious secrets. As she is herself. They are bound beyond earthly tethers.She finds herself caught up in a family drama more incredible than anything she could have dreamed. Supernatural, fantastical events turn Marcieâ€™s reality upside-down, but she will not be played against her lover and her friends. Though she barely understands the rules of this new and treacherous game, she will confront and defeat any danger to protect the man she loves.
author: Diana Rose Wilson
